project-basis: We create some android application for our phone and python scripts / GUI on computer side.
project-challenges: Creating real-time algorithm which works correctly.
project-future-plans: We will see... Perhaps making it to a final version and uploading it so that everyone could see what's it about.
project-purpose: It makes possible to use computer with "dance mat" and phone.
project-inspiration: Being bored of normal way of using computer.
project-lessons-learned: Few things about a python and android development. A lot about other projects.
project-accomplishments: 70-80% of correct configuration. Still few problems with phone configuration in this setup.
project-subtitle: An interface which will make possible to use computer.
